StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [O.cerPoolBoardFindPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@LastName varchar(50) = null ,@FirstName varchar(50) = null ,@Ssn varchar(20) = null ,@OrgId int)
AS
SELECT c.[NwaId] ,c.[NwaRowGuid] ,c.[O.cerContractId] ,c.[O.cerContractRowGuid] ,c.[Name] ,c.[RaceCode] ,c.[EthnicCode] ,c.[SchoolName] ,c.[SchoolCode] ,c.[SchoolRowGuid] ,c.[GenderCode] ,c.[ClassNumber] ,c.[O.cerSourceCode] ,c.[ShipMission] ,oss.[NAME] AS OssName ,(SELECT TOP 1 com.[COMMISSION_DATE] FROM [dbo].[COMMISSIONEE] com WHERE com.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[O.cerContractId]) AS CommissionDate ,(SELECT TOP 1 ot.[TRAINING_TYPE_DESC] FROM [dbo].[OCS] o INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_CLASS] oc ON (oc.[CLASS_ID] = o.[OCS_CLASS_ID] AND o.[NWA_ID] = c.[NwaId]) INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_TRAINING_TYPE] ot ON ot.[TRAINING_TYPE_CODE] = oc.[TRAINING_TYPE_CODE] ORDER BY oc.[CLASS_BEGIN_DATE]) AS OcsTrainingType ,(SELECT TOP 1 oc.CLASS_NUMBER FROM [dbo].[OCS] o INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_CLASS] oc ON oc.[CLASS_ID] = o.[OCS_CLASS_ID] AND o.[NWA_ID] = c.[NwaId] ORDER BY oc.[CLASS_BEGIN_DATE]) AS ClassNumber ,(SELECT TOP 1 cc.[COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION] FROM [dbo].[COMPONENT_CODE] cc WHERE cc.[COMPONENT_CODE] = c.[O.cerComponentCode]) AS Program FROM [usmc].[vwO.cerPoolBoardCandidates] c INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] oss ON oss.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] WHERE c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] = @OrgId AND (c.[LastName] LIKE @LastName OR @LastName IS NULL OR @LastName = '') AND (c.[FirstName] LIKE @FirstName OR @FirstName IS NULL OR @FirstName = '') AND (c.[Ssn] LIKE @Ssn OR @Ssn = NULL OR @Ssn = '') ORDER BY c.[Name]
